note.p: Land agent and surveyor. With his brother Frederic, continued the family business started by his father, John Higgins (1795/6–1872), in Alford, Lincolnshire; they also became surveyors by 1892. Captain in the volunteer rifle battalion, Lincolnshire regiment, 1861–87. County magistrate, circa 1892–1900.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 February 2015)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 February 2015)
